body_html:
I'll merge this for now @carpodaster to not get into troubles with other PRs touching multiple files, such as the approaching one for translating error messages 🙈

If you find the time to look into the details of this PR around renaming namespaces and routes, you can still comment here and I'll address everything in follow up PRs to have this 🗻 out the way ✌️
